title: Urgent
details:
12.5 perches of very valuable land for sale in pathmaperuma road ganemulla wich is ideal for commercial purpose. The land located 5 min away from ganemulla town.
Easy access to kadawata, ja Ela & Ragama city and less than 45 min drive to Colombo capital by train or private vehicle.
• 1 km to ganemulla railway station and ganemulla town.
•. 15 min to Gampaha town.
• 20 min drive to kadawata highway entrance.
• Perfect residential area.
• Clear dead.
• No brokers.



Don't miss this valuable investment opportunity in rapidly developing area in Gampaha district.
